definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate

pinyin: xu1 ni3 xian4 shi2 zhi4 biao1 yu3 yan2

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.
sentences.chinese: 实时水面效果可以大大增强虚拟现实系统的沉浸感。

sentences.english: I must wonder how far is too far when venturing into a virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道当冒险进入虚拟现实时走多远才算可以？

sentences.english: Hadid herself created the immersive display for her objects.
sentences.chinese: 哈迪德为了她的物品创造了沉浸式虚拟现实显示。

sentences.english: ARGs could not have existed before the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 在英特网之前是不可能出现虚拟现实游戏的。

sentences.english: The complex scene's virtual walkthroughs is the important field in which VR is used.
sentences.chinese: 复杂场景的虚拟漫游是虚拟现实中的重要应用领域。

sentences.english: Virtual reality and visualization technology is a cross-technology of muti-subject.
sentences.chinese: 虚拟现实可视化技术是一门多学科交叉技术。

sentences.english: At last, looks into the future about Application of Virtual Reali…
sentences.chinese: 最后对虚拟现实技术在医学中应用进行了展望。

sentences.english: It was first time to make use of virtual reality technology in design of high range air-assisted spraying equipment.
sentences.chinese: 首次将虚拟现实技术运用到高射程喷雾装置的设计中。

sentences.english: Fidelity is critical to Virtual Reality system.
sentences.chinese: 逼真性是虚拟现实的一个重要特性。

sentences.english: You can practice Virtual Reality and cause different activations within you.
sentences.chinese: 你可以练习虚拟现实来激活一个不同的振动。

sentences.english: Virtual assembly is the new research field in VR.
sentences.chinese: 虚拟装配是虚拟现实领域中一个新的研究方向。

sentences.english: This new information may be useful for creating better virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 这个新发现有助于制造更好的虚拟现实。

sentences.english: There is no need to put on a helmet- mounted display in order to enter virtual reality.
sentences.chinese: 这不需用头盔，安放好以进入虚拟现实。

sentences.english: Sensics, Inc. , is the panoramic virtual reality display company.
sentences.chinese: Sensics公司是一家全景虚拟现实显示器公司。

sentences.english: The only way is to do so with virtual reality training.
sentences.chinese: 而唯一的方法就是利用虚拟现实进行培训。

sentences.english: Chapter two is the system design of vehicle simulation test based on VR.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为基于虚拟现实的汽车仿真试验系统设计。
